## bind_racing_bar_chart_data

## Description
 Bind racing bar chart data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_racing_bar_chart_data( 
  ., 
  race_data = NULL, 
  race_name = NULL, 
  race_score = NULL, 
  race_color_category = NULL, 
  race_image = NULL, 
  captions_data = NULL, 
  captions_stage_to_show = NULL, 
  captions_stage_to_hide = NULL, 
  captions_text = NULL, 
  captions_image = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| race_data | A data frame with race data |
| race_name | A column containing the names of the bars, e.g. countries or people |
| race_score | Multiple columns of numbers, each column representing a point in time |
| race_color_category | Optional category column to color the bars. Make sure the "Color mode" setting is set to "By Category" in the "Bar colors" settings panel |
| race_image | Optional column with URLs of images |
| captions_data | A data frame with optional captions |
| captions_stage_to_show | Must match the column headers in the main data sheet |
| captions_stage_to_hide | Must match the column headers in the main data sheet |
| captions_text | Text or HTML to show |
| captions_image | Image to show |
